channel.title: Professional Marketer / Beta tester Looking to help
channel.description:
Hello guys ,
I am a qualified marketer for any industry out there i get asked for improvements and how to manage business's. I have played many Runescape private servers and have been part of many so called 'projects'. I know key aspects in the game that an individual favours. I can provide you with alot of things e.g things you need to change , Bugs.
I have also Beta tested big MMORPG games such as Pocket legends and Celtic heroes on the apple market. I get regular emails requesting me to beta test.
I am available to any one , but will only help out one person. First come first serve. Professional , Mature , are the people who will spark an interest ; Age is something i won't take to account.
Skype - divine.divine786
Take care , Peace.

item.title: Professional Marketer / Beta tester Looking to help
item.dc:creator: @mistelx mistelx
item.description:
@mistelx wrote:

marcbob:

Can you get me hundreds on my server in under 1 hour? I r need pro marketer plz

Skype me my friend.

Its not cocky when you can back it up

Read full topic

item.title: Professional Marketer / Beta tester Looking to help
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:519973”][quote author=mistelx link=topic=638465.msg4303656#msg4303656 date=1369422691]
People will come to me.
I’m not wasting my time going to no one.

They come to me they will benefit.
[/quote]
No one will come to you acting like that.[/quote]
